content: <?xml version = "1.0" encoding = "UTF-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/services/lode/imsloreg_v1p0"     targetNamespace="http://www.imsglobal.org/services/lode/imsloreg_v1p0"     xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"     version="IMS LODE REG 1.0"     elementFormDefault="qualified"     attributeFormDefault="unqualified">     <xs:annotation>         <xs:documentation>             XSD Data File Information             -------------------------             Author:         Colin Smythe             Date:           2nd March, 2010             Version:        Draft 8.0             Status:         Base Document             Description:    The data model and vocabularies for the LODE Registry information.              History:        Version 1.0: The first formal release of this PSM binding. The supported UML authoring tools are:             (a) Poseidon \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd v6 (and later)              Source XSLT File Information             ----------------------------             XSL Generator:    UMLtoXSDTransformv0p9.xsl             XSLT Processor:   Xalan             Release:          1.0 Beta 3             Date:             31st May, 2009              IMS GLC Auto-generation Binding Tool-kit (I-BAT)             ------------------------------------------------             This file was auto-generated using the IMS GLC Binding Auto-generation Tool-kit (I-BAT). All Rights Reserved.         </xs:documentation>     </xs:annotation>      <!-- Generate Global Attributes *********************************************************************** -->      <!-- ================================================================================================== -->      <!-- Generate Namespaced extension Group  ************************************************************* -->      <xs:group name="grpStrict.any">         <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation>                 Any namespaced element from any namespace may be included within an "any" element.                 The namespace for the imported element must be defined in the instance, and the schema must be imported.                 The extension has a definition of "strict" i.e. they must have their own namespace.             </xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:sequence>             <xs:any namespace = "##other" processContents = "strict" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>         </xs:sequence>     </xs:group>      <!-- ================================================================================================== -->      <!-- Generate Special DataTypes  ********************************************************************** -->      <!-- ================================================================================================== -->      <!-- Generate the enumerated simpleType declarations ************************************************** -->      <!-- ******************************************* -->      <xs:element name="catalog" type="xs:normalizedString" />      <xs:element name="entry" type="xs:normalizedString" />      <!-- ************************************ -->      <xs:simpleType name="CharacterString.Type">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/>     </xs:simpleType>      <!-- **************************** -->      <!-- ================================================================================================== -->      <!-- Generate the data-type ComplexTypes ************************************************************** -->      <xs:complexType name="MetadataCollection.Type">         <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation source="umldocumentation"> minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>         </xs:choice>     </xs:complexType>      <xs:complexType name="ToMetadataCollectionRelationship.Type">         <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation           <xs:extension base="VocabTerm.Type">                 <xs:sequence>                     <xs:element name="strength" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "1">                         <xs:simpleType> name="protocolImplementationDescription" type="ProtocolImplementationDescription.Type" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element name="responsible" type="Responsible.Type" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>             <xs:element name="accessPolicy" type="ToAccessPolicyRelationship.Type" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element name="collection" type="ToCollectionRelationship.Type" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "1"/>         </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>      <xs:complexType name="ProtocolImplementationDescription.Type"> </xs:annotation>         <xs:sequence>             <xs:group ref="grpStrict.any"/>         </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>      <xs:complexType name="ToAccessPolicyRelationship.Type"> source="umldocumentation">                 The AccessPolicy  class is the container for ...             </xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:sequence>             <xs:element name="identifier" type="Identifier.Type" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element name="description" type="LangString.Type" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>         </xs:sequence> type="ToMetadataCollectionRelationship.Type" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element name="contentCollection" type="ToContentCollectionRelationship.Type" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element name="protocolDescriptionBindingNamespace" type="xs:anyURI" minOccurs = "1" maxOccurs = "1"/>             <xs:element
